name: 2d Laces
description:
Link to my liluo.io.   https://liluo.io/games/dabc76be-682f-45f3-bd76-a2d55bbfe2f9 

This is a 2d top down shoes game in which you have to navigate around a room with your laces tied together, and the two shoes are at a fixed seperation ( incorporated with the theme of the jam ) and you have to cut the laces with the help of scissors placed in the room .

Each room is carefully designed with spikes and walls 

If the shoe get stuck in the wall try to move the other shoes around and retry to move the first shoe and if you have any problem you can let me know

How i have implemented the theme

The two shoes are at fixed seperation which is the main mechanics of the game and you have to seperate the two shoes .The shoes and sissors are at some seperation in the room
